code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'../utils/axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function TaskList(){const[tasks,setTasks]=useState([]);const[error,setError]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{const fetchTasks=async()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');try{const response=await axios.get('/tasks',{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`}});setTasks(response.data);}catch(err){setError('Failed to load tasks');}};fetchTasks();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Task List"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:tasks.map(task=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:task.description},task._id))})]});}export default TaskList;
